short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension scheduling assistant to help you make your day greener, one task at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gredule–"green schedule"–is a chrome extension that runs in parallel with the Gredule calendar to offer a scheduling assistant that helps the user adopt a more sustainable lifestyle. The user can plan out their day through customizing their schedule on the Gredule website. Gredule analyzes the calendar events and outputs suggestions for the user on ways they can make their schedule more green and eco-friendly. The chrome extension stores the upcoming tasks in its popup. The aim of Gredule is to bring awareness to everyday unsustainable practices, helping users become more environmentally conscious individuals.
